name: Touch and Patch: Free Shapes Puzzle Game for Kids
name_original: Touch and Patch: Free Shapes Puzzle Game for Kids
description:
Touch and Patch: Free Shapes Puzzle for Kids is an app designed for ready-witted, active and merry kids. Your little ones can entertain and educate themselves while playing this amazing puzzle game. They can learn alphabet, names of fruit, wild animals and pets. Moreover, solving puzzles your kids can improve their creative thinking, diligence, assiduity, memory, attention and logic skills. The distinguishing feature of this game is its engaging shape puzzle mechanics. There are four different packs with more than 70 colorful puzzles. The game is really captivating, and it is impossible to put it down!

WATCH VIDEO: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eQ66vYyx034

Features:

• 4 thematic level packs to enjoy
• 70 + engaging shape puzzles
• Educational brainteaser for your kids
• Picturesque graphics
• Shape puzzle game mechanics

Touch and Patch: Free Shapes Puzzle for Kids is an easy and challenging game and it fits even the smallest kids. The task is to restore the picture. Tap a piece and drag it to the suitable position. The piece begins to spark when you put it to the appropriate place.

Puzzle games are popular among people of all ages. They help to while away the time and have fun. But not every one knows that they also help to train the brain and improve logic. You can solve the puzzle yourself or together with your little ones. Touch and Patch: Free Shapes Puzzle for Kids gives you a great chance to play and spend time with your kids.
